tool_description: Constructs chronological timeline of incident events using evidence, witness statements, and other investigation data to establish sequence of events.

incident_id.description: Unique incident identifier to build timeline for

event_descriptions.description: Descriptions of events to include in timeline

event_sources.description: Sources of information for each event

timeline_creator.description: Name of investigator creating the timeline

confidence_levels.description: Confidence levels for each event (high, medium, low)

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Incident ID must correspond to an existing investigation case.
Array length mismatch: Event descriptions, timestamps, and sources arrays must have equal length.
Invalid timestamp format: All event timestamps must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Insufficient events: Timeline must contain at least 2 events.
Too many events: Maximum 50 events can be processed in single timeline.
Invalid confidence level: Each confidence level must be one of [high, medium, low].
Confidence array mismatch: If provided, confidence_levels array must match event count.
usage: Provide incident_id, event_descriptions, event_timestamps, event_sources arrays (all equal length), and timeline_creator. Optionally provide confidence_levels array. Creates chronological event sequence.

timeline_id.description: Unique identifier for the constructed timeline

total_events.description: Total number of events in timeline

timeline_duration.description: Time span covered by the timeline

gaps_identified.description: Whether timeline has identified gaps requiring investigation
